title: Salon_Flow
description: Cloud-native, multi-tenant salon management SaaS with AI-first architecture. Built on Google Cloud Platform with 25 specialized AI agents, 4 Progressive Web Apps (Owner, Manager, Staff, Client), and event-driven serverless backend using Firestore, Firebase Auth, and Twilio omnichannel communications.
instructions:
## Project Guidelines

### Working Directory
- Always work inside /a0/usr/projects/salon_flow
- Do not rename project directory or modify .a0proj meta files

### Architecture
- **Database**: Firestore (NoSQL document store) with multi-tenant isolation via salon_id
- **Authentication**: Firebase Auth with custom JWT extension (bcrypt)
- **Monorepo structure**: apps/ (owner, manager, staff, client PWAs), services/ (api, ai, notification), packages/ (ui, shared)
- **AI Architecture**: 25 specialized agents with hexagonal/pipeline/microkernel layers
- **Event-driven**: GCP Pub/Sub for async communication between services
- **Serverless**: Cloud Run with scale-to-zero for cost efficiency

### Development Workflow
- Use TDD approach - write tests first
- Run tests before committing: npm test (frontend) and pytest (backend)
- Follow existing code patterns and conventions
- Use specialized agents for complex tasks (see .a0proj/agents/)

### PWA Testing with Playwright CLI (v1.58.2)

#### Test Configurations
- playwright.config.ts - Default local testing
- playwright.prod.config.ts - Production URL testing
- playwright.gcp.config.ts - GCP deployment testing
- playwright.debug.config.ts - Debug mode with traces

#### Running Tests
```bash
# Run all PWA tests locally
npx playwright test

# Run specific PWA app tests
npx playwright test tests/e2e/owner.spec.ts
npx playwright test tests/e2e/staff.spec.ts
npx playwright test tests/e2e/manager.spec.ts
npx playwright test tests/e2e/client.spec.ts

# Run against production
npx playwright test --config=playwright.prod.config.ts

# Run GCP integration tests
npx playwright test --config=playwright.gcp.config.ts

# Debug mode with traces
npx playwright test --config=playwright.debug.config.ts --trace on

# View test report
npx playwright show-report
```

#### Workflow Pattern: Navigate → Snapshot → Interact → Verify
1. Navigate to PWA URL
2. Take snapshot for visual baseline
3. Interact with elements using locators
4. Verify expected outcomes

#### Test Results
- Results stored in test-results/
- HTML reports in playwright-report/ and playwright-report-gcp/
- Traces available for debugging failed tests

### Key Integrations
- **Firestore**: NoSQL database with multi-tenant data isolation
- **Firebase Auth**: JWT-based authentication with custom token extension
- **Twilio**: WhatsApp Business API and SMS for omnichannel communications (cost-optimized)
- **OpenRouter**: LLM gateway for 25 AI agents (Gemini models)
- **Google Cloud Run**: Serverless deployment with scale-to-zero
- **Upstash Redis**: Session and AI response caching
- **Upstash Vector**: Semantic search and RAG capabilities
- **GCP Pub/Sub**: Event-driven messaging between services

### API Testing
- Backend tests use pytest in tests/api/
- AI service tests in tests/ai/
- Run with: pytest tests/ -v

### Cost Optimization
- Twilio: Use GSM-7 encoding (no emojis), keep messages under 160 chars, SMS for normal priority
- AI: Response caching via Upstash Redis reduces LLM calls by 70%
- Compute: Cloud Run scale-to-zero saves 60% on compute costs
